Uses of Package
elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula

  • Packages that use elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula 
    Package Description
    elki.clustering.em.models  
    elki.clustering.kmeans
    K-means clustering and variations.
    elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula
    Initialization methods for BIRCH-based k-means and EM clustering.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula used by elki.clustering.em.models 
    Class Description
    AbstractCFKMeansInitialization
    Abstract base class for CF k-means initializations.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula used by elki.clustering.kmeans 
    Class Description
    AbstractCFKMeansInitialization
    Abstract base class for CF k-means initializations.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula used by elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization.betula 
    Class Description
    AbstractCFKMeansInitialization
    Abstract base class for CF k-means initializations.
    AbstractCFKMeansInitialization.Par
    Parameterization class.
    CFInitWeight
    Initialization weight function for k-means initialization with BETULA.
    CFKPlusPlusLeaves
    K-Means++-like initialization for BETULA k-means, treating the leaf clustering features as a flat list, and called "leaves" in the publication.
    CFKPlusPlusLeaves.Par
    Parameterization class.
    CFKPlusPlusTree
    Initialize K-means by following tree paths weighted by their variance contribution.
    CFKPlusPlusTrunk
    Trunk strategy for initializing k-means with BETULA: only the nodes up to a particular level are considered for k-means++ style initialization.
    CFRandomlyChosen
    Initialize K-means by randomly choosing k existing elements as initial cluster centers for Clustering Features.
    CFWeightedRandomlyChosen
    Initialize K-means by randomly choosing k existing elements as initial cluster centers for Clustering Features.
